arts.ttl: Roy Keane snubs Man Utd and Sir Alex Ferguson as he names 'highlight of career'

arts.ttl: Preview: St Johnstone vs. Hibernian - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Scottish Premiership clash between St Johnstone and Hibernian, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Struggling St Johnstone host a Hibernian team that have hoisted themselves away from a basement battle in their first Scottish Premiership fixture of 2025. Saints were at the foot of the league table...
